titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Fort Magruder Fishing Club Records 1932
titlestmt.subtitle: Fort Magruder Fishing Club Records Mss. Acc. 2002.46

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid created by Special Collections Staff, 2007

frontmatter.titlepage:
Inventory of the Fort Magruder Fishing Club Records, 1932 A Collection in the
Special Collections Research Center Mss. Acc. 2002.46

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Collection includes the constitution and bylaws and minutes of meeting, dated 7 May 1932, signed by G. K. Vanderslice and G. E. Meanley, of the Fort Magruder Fishing Club, Williamsburg, Virginia.
did.origination: Fort Magruder Fishing Club Meanley, G. E. Vanderslice, G. K. arrangement

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before publishing quotations or excerpts from any materials, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Fort Magruder Fishing Club Records, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection includes the constitution and bylaws and minutes of meeting, dated 7 May 1932, signed by G. K. Vanderslice and G. E. Meanley, of the Fort Magruder Fishing Club, Williamsburg, Virginia.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.
